review: my all time favaourite bollywood action movie. dhoom was one of a kind. after the 90s bollywood was desperately in need of such high end, slick, commendable action movie to get to the next step moviemaking. this one provided that breakthrough perfectly.. superb cinematography, breathtaking actions, badass music..i feel lucky that i belong to dhoom era...

my all time favourite movie... i have seen dhoom more than 100 times....n the reason is the suzuki hayabusa my dream bike..n on that cool rider johan in a different kind of attitude. i just love this movie..this the best one from dhoom series.  in 2004 they changed the destination of action movies in bollywood...

actors acting were real good . i have still cd of this movie . storyline direction presentation was very good . musics were superb specially salame karde salame dekho dewano mast mast hai sama this music has been shooted in taj exotica goa and dhoom 2 was also very good . 100 out of 100 .
